overrides.role-description:
## Task
Merge and dedupe 3-level suggestions; keep only the highest-value items.
overrides.intelligent-merging:
## Rules
Combine related items, merge overlaps, and keep unique insights. Never mention levels.
overrides.balanced-output:
### Output
Max 2-3 praise items. Prefer line-level over file-level. Ensure suggestions are actionable.
overrides.human-centric-framing:
### Framing
Use soft language: "Consider...", "Worth noting..." â€” guidance, not mandates.
